General.Name: XinJiang GuoTong Pipeline Co Ltd
General.Description: XinJiang GuoTong Pipeline CO.,Ltd engages in the design and manufacture of prestressed concrete cylinder pipes (PCCP) in China. The company also develops and produces other hi-tech concrete products and pipes. Its products are used in various fields, such as water resource projects, municipal works, electric power projects, agricultural irrigation projects, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Urumqi, China.
General.Address: The Industry Development Zone of Miquan, Urumqi, China, 831407
